dcterms:description: The ICASSP 2022 DNS-challenge full-band dataset is used for experiments in deep noise suppression, providing a comprehensive set of audio samples for training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: ICASSP 2022 DNS-challenge full-band dataset

dcterms:description: DEMAND is a dataset that provides noise data used in conjunction with other datasets for training noise suppression models.
dcterms:title: DEMAND

dcterms:description: Freesound is a collaborative database of Creative Commons Licensed sounds, used for noise data in audio processing tasks.
dcterms:title: Freesound

dcterms:description: AudioSet is a large-scale dataset of audio events, utilized for training models in various audio processing tasks.
dcterms:title: AudioSet

dcterms:creator: Jont B Allen
David A Berkley
dcterms:description: Room Impulse Responses (RIRs) generated based on the image method are used to simulate small-room acoustics for audio processing tasks.
dcterms:title: Room Impulse Responses (RIRs) generated based on the image method
